name: Drone Management System
description: It is a web based system to manage a fleet of drones operating in the country
SDGevidence:
The aim is to save lives with last mile delivery system in areas which are inaccessible via means of road transportation. The DMS (Drone Management System) helps to manage and monitor all the drones connected the system.
